Android MPG Tracker is a simple application that helps you keep track of your gas mileage over time and see your trend over time.

Step One: 
Use the Settings Screen to set up your vehicle profiles. Touch My Vehicles, then Add A Vehicle. Use the dropdowns to select your car's year, make, model and trim. Set up as many vehicles as you plan to drive regularly.

Step Two: 
Track your mileage. If you're tracking your mileage we know you're already diligent about resetting your trip odometer and putting the mileage and fill-up through your phone's calculator. Just keep doing that but instead select Track a Fill-Up from the main screen, select your car from the dropdown and input the data.

Step Three: 
See how your last tank compares to previous tanks. Over time we will continue to collect data from other drivers of the same vehicle, and as that data builds up you will be able to compare your performance to the community as a whole.

(Data behind vehicle selection is provided by Edmunds)
